originalText.text: Every doc team should be like Dr. Melone & Co!  They are unbelievable at both, innovative world-class tech expertise, plus over the top gentle caring human touch! Thank you thank you, for setting me up for future success!

text.text: Every doc team should be like Dr. Melone & Co!  They are unbelievable at both, innovative world-class tech expertise, plus over the top gentle caring human touch! Thank you thank you, for setting me up for future success!

originalText.text: I waited about 40 minutes until Dr, Melone arrived for my appointment. He immediately identified my problem and explained the treatment. He was patient and kind, and I felt immdiate relief after the injection.  I look forward to continued recovery as I follow his instructions. His staff was cordial and pleasant.

He was patient and kind, and I felt immdiate relief after the injection.  I look forward to continued recovery as I follow his instructions. His staff was cordial and pleasant.

originalText.text: Dr Melone has been one of the most professional, respectful, and all around pleasant surgeons I have experienced. Dr Melone and members of his office have shown an extreme level of care and compassion for me during my time with him. I simply can not thank Dr Melone enough for everything he has done.

text.text: Dr Melone has been one of the most professional, respectful, and all around pleasant surgeons I have experienced. Dr Melone and members of his office have shown an extreme level of care and compassion for me during my time with him. I simply can not thank Dr Melone enough for everything he has done.

originalText.text:
Dr. Charles P. Melone , Jr. generously agreed to take me on as a patient whose rheumatoid arthritis had completely rendered my hands, grotesquely disfigured, ultimately useless, over the past ten years.  I have the most severe form of the disease (positive anti-CCP) with a very late onset.  I remain an active professional in a field that inspires me, have a life-long engagement with art in various forms, have computer proficiency,  as well as  having cultivated culinary skills over the years. I  really wanted my life back.

Two and half months ago I had complicated reconstructive surgery that included silicone knuckle implants, tendon grafts, and much more that I don't begin to understand  My hand following surgery was newly born; it looked just as it had before my disease --Beautiful!  Dr. Melone has carefully monitored my healing progress with far more frequent appointments than would be expected, multiple x-rays, a tensioning brace, then a design for a stabilizing appliance, and continued interactions with my hand therapists.  It is my impression that a younger patient with a less severe deformity, existing over a shorter duration, would have been less challenging as a patient and required far less attention.  Dr. Melone has been exceedingly patient and encouraging, and I am gradually regaining the use of my hand.

Dr. Melone was recommended to me several years ago by a professor of hand therapy as the top hand surgeon in New York.  Another hand therapist, and professor of hand therapy at NYU, described Dr. Melone as  the best hand surgeon in the country. An anesthesiologist from a New York bone clinic remarked, “Your surgeon is famous!”  --I feel very fortunate to have had Dr. Melone perform my surgery, and very grateful.

originalText.text: Came with a debilitating arthritic  thumb on my primary hand.  Dr. Melone explained what he was going to do, and tho the injection hurt a bit, in no time I was totally pain free!!  I cannot believe it was so easy to get 100% relief & ultimate ability to do all the movements I had lost the ability to do.
